summary: The Postables---Oliver, Shane, Rita, and Norman return to explore the mystery of true love as they deliver divorce papers to one couple the same day Oliver's missing wife reappears.
cast: Eric Mabius|Kristin Booth|Yan-Kay Crystal Lowe|Geoff Gustafson|Poppy Montgomery|Zak Santiago|Kevin McGarry|Brooke Nevin|Frank Zotter|Briana Buckmaster|Davin Tong|Byron Noble|Monice Peter|Chris Shields|Leo Rano|Curtis Lum|Joanne Pesusich|Maddie Phillips|Morgan Tanner
keywords: woman wears eyeglasses|divorce papers|missing wife|porch swing|snow
title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered: From Paris with Love
